programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Turkish Airlines EuroLeague
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Unspouse My House
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Lotov√µitja unistuste kodu
programme.sub-title: Rolling In It on the Texas Plains
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Rohkem kui 50 riigis on dokumenteeritud ule 10 000 viljaringi moodustise, millest paljudel on omadusi, mis ei allu tavaparastele seletustele. Kas need on maavalise paritoluga? Ja kui jah, siis mis on nende eesmark?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Evolve

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Radio host Jimmy Church (Fade to Black, Coast to Coast AM) and a dedicated group of truth-seekers are hitting the road and investigating the biggest mysteries, controversies, and conspiracies of our strange world including: A possible covert undersea UFO base hidden off the California Coast. Is it possible that a popular virtual smartphone game might actually be part of a CIA operation? Did the U.S. government create an army of mind-controlled assassins? Plus a look into a possible plot to assassinate President John Kennedy just weeks before the tragic events in Dallas. A search for lost Confederate gold. A new Bigfoot hotspot where you least expect it. A new theory on time travel and missing nuclear weapons right here in America. We seek disclosure, answers and the truth. We seek to understand The Unexplained.

programme.title: Beck - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Kaleo - In Session
programme.desc: Kaleo hail from Iceland, but you wouldnt know it by the fits Southern voodoo hiding in this unexpected session.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti: A Classic Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Of Monsters and Men - Main Square Festival 2013
programme.desc: The Icelandic band Of Monsters and Men perform a fun and entertaining set in sunny Arras, France. The folk story-tellers hit all the right notes!

programme.title: Childish Gambino - Live at Rockwood Music Hall
programme.desc: Its been a crazy year for Donald Glover, but nothing has been more blazing than his career as rapper Childish Gambino. The project, born of a Wu-Tang name generator, is full of witty, rambunctious energy, as he effortlessly demonstrates in his session at Rockwood Music Hall. Along with collaborator and musical guru Ludwig Gransson on electric guitar, Gambino rips through tracks from his wildly popular EP as well as the lead single from his debut album Camp (out now on Glassnote Records). From introspection to love to pop culture and punny metaphors, Gambino runs an impressive lyrical gammit, one that inspires all the vital decision making organs.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums: Anthem To Beauty
programme.desc: This installment of the Classic Albums series follows the making of two Grateful Dead albums, the fiercely experimental Anthem of the Sun and the understated masterwork American Beauty, which spawned melodic gems like "Sugar Magnolia" and "Ripple." Between the archival scenes and contemporary interviews with band members, the program shows a band making seismic in roads in pop music and five young guys coming to terms with artistry, mortality, and, yes, the pursuit of happiness. There is priceless footage of Neal Cassady driving Ken Keseys bus and of the Dead, surrounded by martini sipping hipsters, on Playboy After Dark. The best scenes involve band members talking about specific songs (you will never hear Phil Leshs "Box of Rain" again without thinking of it as a gift to his dying father) or deconstructing a tune by playing each track separately. Intimate and surprisingly cohesive, Anthem to Beauty is a rare glimpse into how the Deads magic was made.

programme.title: Hozier - Live at Coachella
programme.desc: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is an annual music and arts festival held at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, in the Coachella Valley

programme.title: Beck - Austin City Limits

programme.title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums: Anthem To Beauty
programme.desc: This installment of the Classic Albums series follows the making of two Grateful Dead albums, the fiercely experimental Anthem of the Sun and the understated masterwork American Beauty, which spawned melodic gems like "Sugar Magnolia" and "Ripple." Between the archival scenes and contemporary interviews with band members, the program shows a band making seismic in roads in pop music and five young guys coming to terms with artistry, mortality, and, yes, the pursuit of happiness. There is priceless footage of Neal Cassady driving Ken Keseys bus and of the Dead, surrounded by martini sipping hipsters, on Playboy After Dark. The best scenes involve band members talking about specific songs (you will never hear Phil Leshs "Box of Rain" again without thinking of it as a gift to his dying father) or deconstructing a tune by playing each track separately. Intimate and surprisingly cohesive, Anthem to Beauty is a rare glimpse into how the Deads magic was made.

programme.title: Alice Cooper - Welcome To My Nightmare
programme.desc: This special edition documentary feature from Alice Cooper includes the 1976 concert film "Welcome To My Nightmare" and, releasing for the first time, the 1975 TV special "Alice Cooper: The Nightmare". "Alice Cooper: The Nightmare" is the rarely seen 1975 TV special that aired on ABC, in conjunction with the release of the legendary "Welcome To My Nightmare" album. The TV special stars Alice Cooper as Steven and Vincent Price as The Spirit of the Nightmare, and showcases every song from the "Welcome To My Nightmare" album, including Only Women Bleed, Department of Youth, Cold Ethyl and the title track. "Welcome To My Nightmare" features hits and classic songs, including Im Eighteen, School s Out, Only Women Bleed, No More Mr. Nice Guy and, of course, Welcome To My Nightmare. The nightmare vividly comes to life on the rock stage, bringing forth a plethora of skeletons, giant spiders, a cyclops, the "magic" movie screen and the voice of horrormeister Vincent Price, all designed to thrill you and keep you uneasy in your sleep.

programme.title: Enrique Iglesias _ Live from Odyssey Arena
programme.desc: Filmed at Odyssey Arena, Belfast, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Enrique Iglesias featuring unforgettable version of his hits: ""Bailamos"", ""Hero"", ""Be With You"" and many more‚Ä¶.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Birmingham in the late 1960s was an industrial city, packed with music groups. At its height, the New Musical Express had reported 500 on its bustling circuit and from two of these groups, Black Sabbath was formed. The Beatles would be a key influence for Ozzy, but bassist Geezer Butler also shaped Ozzys work, through his lyrics After signing to Vertigo Records in 1970, the four piece used their distinctive sound to full effect for their self-titled debut album, Black Sabbath. Black Sabbath became a commercial success, entering the UK top 10 and the US charts. In its first year it sold one million copies. Keen to build on the success, the band entered the studio just four months after releasing their debut. The title track, Paranoid, would lead the new album. Featuring archive material, music videos "PARANOID" "EVIL WOMAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.sub-title: Fall Out Boy _ Boys of Zummer: Live In Chicago
programme.desc: Join Multi-platinum selling artist Fall Out Boy as they travel back to their hometown of Chicago for a mind-blowing audio and visual extravaganza that will change your concept of what a rock concert should be! Featuring their newest hits Centuries, Irresistible and Uma Thurman, this 70 minute, 17 song concert also includes American Beauty/American Psycho; Sugar, Were Goin Down; Dance, Dance; This Aint a Scene, Its an Arms Race; Thnks fr th Mmrs and My Songs Know What You Did in the Dark (Light Em Up). This special performance will go down in history as one of the most memorable concerts from Fall Out Boys career, filmed during the Boys of Zummer tour that spanned over 39 cities throughout 2015. With stunning video walls containing dynamic visual content, great musicianship, and powerful songs all make for an unforgettable concert experience!

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Amy Winehouse was an English singer and songwriter whose stunning voice easily following in the footsteps of Janis Joplin and Billie Holiday. Her debut album, Frank (was a critical success in the UK and was nominated for the Mercury Prize. Her follow-up album, Back to Black (2006), led to five 50th Annual Grammy Awards, and a record of most Grammys won by a female artist in one night. In short, a music legend who died at the young age of 27, from alcohol intoxication on 23 July 2011. Her album Back to Black posthumously became one the UKs best-selling albums of the 21st century.

The most passionate, powerful, dedicated and loud Maggots on Earth attended in hordes to witness in action their most inspirational figures: the 9 members of Slipknot. The band did not disappoint. programme.title: M√µrva k√µned
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: Exposed

programme.title: Exposed

programme.title: Who Is Luigi Mangione?
programme.desc: 26-year-old Luigi Mangione is a young man from wealth and privilege. What drove him to the deadly shooting of United Healthcare CEO, Brian Thompson?

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: The story follows forensic expert Alina Burroughs as she utilizes her scientific expertise to uncover the darkest murder mysteries from across the country. Throughout the six-episode programme, Burroughs will investigate some truly baffling cases ranging from a deadly fall from a balcony to the tragic death of a young college student that was believed to be closed.

programme.title: Blood Runs Cold
programme.desc: This fascinating true crime documentary series follows families who, riddled with grief, have gone above and beyond to ensure the killers of their loved ones see justice. These inspiring individuals, sometimes with police officers by their side, go to unfathomable lengths to catch the wanted perpetrators, trying to find new evidence or witnesses to help crack the case and catch the killer on the loose.

programme.title: Blood Runs Cold
programme.desc: This fascinating true crime documentary series follows families who, riddled with grief, have gone above and beyond to ensure the killers of their loved ones see justice. These inspiring individuals, sometimes with police officers by their side, go to unfathomable lengths to catch the wanted perpetrators, trying to find new evidence or witnesses to help crack the case and catch the killer on the loose.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Perfektne m√µrv
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.sub-title: You Know What Time It Is
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Following Roo Powell, a 38-year-old child advocate, and her team at non-profit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) as they conduct an undercover operation to identify and stop adult predators who use the internet to harm the most vulnerable. With the help of her team, Roo transforms into a teen to reveal the identities of the men who reach out to her.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: Host, and former federal prosecutor, Sunny Hostin (from The View) takes us on an investigative journey to uncover the true stories of crime victims and their loved ones. Unlike most crime shows which focus on the motives or backstory of the killers, this show exposes the real, deadly impact on those who suffer at the hands of the perpetrator. The stories of everyday people who get caught up in these heinous crimes often go unheard and it is equally important that these individuals get to tell their stories as it is for us to hear them. Sunny also interviews the detectives, prosecutors, coroners, and others involved to piece together the truth of each case. With an intention to be socially inclusive, the show highlights stories concerning people of color, women and the LGBTQ community.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: To catch a killer, you have to think like a killer. In this true-crime documentary series, a team of dedicated experts led by detective Mike Arntfield attempt to solve murder cases that have gone cold, bringing closure to victims families. By re-enacting the crimes, uncovering new evidence, talking with friends and family members, and using 21st century technology, the team of passionate investigators hunt down every lead in order to solve the case.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: Host, and former federal prosecutor, Sunny Hostin (from The View) takes us on an investigative journey to uncover the true stories of crime victims and their loved ones. Unlike most crime shows which focus on the motives or backstory of the killers, this show exposes the real, deadly impact on those who suffer at the hands of the perpetrator. The stories of everyday people who get caught up in these heinous crimes often go unheard and it is equally important that these individuals get to tell their stories as it is for us to hear them. Sunny also interviews the detectives, prosecutors, coroners, and others involved to piece together the truth of each case. With an intention to be socially inclusive, the show highlights stories concerning people of color, women and the LGBTQ community.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: To catch a killer, you have to think like a killer. In this true-crime documentary series, a team of dedicated experts led by detective Mike Arntfield attempt to solve murder cases that have gone cold, bringing closure to victims families. By re-enacting the crimes, uncovering new evidence, talking with friends and family members, and using 21st century technology, the team of passionate investigators hunt down every lead in order to solve the case.

programme.title: The 1980s
programme.desc: Although the 1980s is one of the most fondly remembered decades, it was also a deadly one. This nostalgic crime documentary series looks beyond the big hair, bright and bold make-up, leg-warmers, electronic pop music, yuppie culture and classic movies. This series delves in the sinister side of the decade, revealing some of the more shocking events that took place at this time. Real-life murders are re-enacted. Whilst investigators are still grappling with questions about these horrific crimes after all these years. Shocking tales from all over the USA, from the death of a teenage cheerleader in California to mass murder in Missouri and homicide amongst New Yorks elite - this series may make you think differently about 1980 forever.

programme.title: American Nightmare
programme.desc: Documentary series that uses actual footage of shocking crime scenes and home-videos of victims and their families to document some atrocious incidents of recent years. By seeing real-life images of the people involved in the crime, we are brought up-close and personal with those affected by horrific acts. Interviews with loved ones of the victim and the officers involved in the investigation help us understand the events that followed the crimes.

programme.title: American Nightmare

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A true crime show with a twist - the chiling stories are told from the fictionalised first-person pespective of the victim. The stories reveal that victims are often normal, average Americans with everyday dreams and concerns about money, their relationshiips, their jobs, their family, etc. who fall prey to the betrayal of friends, colleagues, family members or lovers. The motives vary in each epsiode, from jealousies concerning an extramarital affair to robbery, personal vendettas and secret ambitions. The show uses dramatised recreations of the events to bring the viewer closer to the people involved and also includes interviews with the victims family and the detectives who investigated the crime.

programme.title: Bride Killa
programme.desc: True crime documentary series that reveals the chilling murders both of, and by, brides on their wedding day. A celebration that is supposed to be the happiest day of any brides life, the occasions we examine in this series are remembered for all the wrong reasons. Bride Killa features thorough reenactments and testimonies of brutal killings, where engaged couples have taken the vow, "til death do us part", far too literally. Whether its a bride who sees red, lashing out in a furious rage, or a jealous groom, who cant let go of his suspicions, this murder series is truly unbelievable.

programme.title: T√µelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case ‚Äì sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: Cesar and Christina Laureans Marine marriage is a grand alliance, but when Lance Corporal Maria Lauterbach joins the regiment, disaster strikes.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that features terrifying real-life stories of people who have been the victims of stalkers. In the beginning, a persistent suitor, new friend, or nosy neighbor may seem harmless, but soon they can form an obsession and refuse to let go, often creating a fantasy world in which friendship isnt enough. Victims will have to fight to protect themselves and their families from an obsessive person who starts to torment them.

programme.title: Carla Bley Sextet - Lugano Jazz Estival
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Discover the special bond between pianist Carla Bley and bassist Steve Swallow. The two have performed in the same bands since the 60s and have been romantic partners for more than two decades. Watching them perform is the definition of musical telepathy. Together with musicians Wayne Krantz, Victor Lewis, Larry Willis, and Don Alias, they form an amazing sextet at Estival in 1986.

programme.title: Glenn Gould - Hereafter
programme.desc: HEREAFTER is a retrospective of the life and work of Gould, seen from todays point of view. Based a synthesis of all the documents existing on Gould, whether of a musical or of a literary and intellectual nature, this film strives to deal with the question of Goulds genius such as it is perceived by his audience, an audience that extends far beyond the strict notion of a musical audience. It is made with the participation of anonymous "disciples", making it seem as if Gould himself was answering their questions; meanwhile, Gould appears as the master of the narration of the film. Serge Prokofiev Vision Fugitive op.22 n¬∞1 Johannes Brahms Intermezzo op.

programme.title: Jean-Yves Thibaudet, San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen
programme.sub-title: Jean-Yves Thibaudet, San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen: Scriabin - Prometheus
programme.desc: San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen (conductor) Jean-Yves Thibaudet (piano) Mathilde Laurent (perfumer) Alexander Scriabin 1872 - 1915 Prometheus, The Poem of Fire Alexander Scriabins symphonic poem "Prometheus, The Poem of Fire" celebrates synesthesia and cosmic unity. Devised by San Francisco Symphony Music Director Esa-Pekka Salonen, pianist Jean-Yves Thibaudet, and Cartier in-house perfumer Mathilde Laurent, the San Francisco Symphony and Cartier present a multisensory production of Prometheus. This collaborative world premiere combines dynamic musical and light performance with olfactory curation, subsuming audiences in Scriabins creative vision more than a century after the piece of total art was composed. Directed by Sebastien Glas San Francisco, Davies Symphony Hall, 3 mars 2024

programme.desc: The Perfect American Opera in two acts Libretto by Rudy Wurlitzer, based on the novel "The perfect American" by Jungk Dennis Russell Davies (Music director) Phelim Mc Dermott (Stage director) Dan Potra (Set designer, costume designer) Jon Clark (Lighting) Ben Wright (Choreographer) Leo Warner (59 Productions) (Video) Andres M√°spero (Chorus master) Christopher Purves (Walt Disney) David Pittsinger (Roy) Donald Kaasch (Dantine) Janis Kelly (Hazel George) Marie McLaughlin (Lillian Disney) Sarah Tynan (Sharon) Nazan Fikret (Diane) Rosie Lomas (Lucy | Josh) Zachary James (Abraham Lincoln | Employee of the mortuary) John Easterlin (Andy Warhol) Juan Noval-Moro (Chuck | A doctor) Beatriz de G√°lvez (A secretary) Noelia Bu√±uel (A nurse) The Improbable Skills Ensemble (Actors) Coro y Orquesta titular del Teatro Real (Coro Intermezzo y Orquesta Sinfonica de Madrid) World premiere recorded at Teatro Real in Madrid in 2013 Directed by J√°nos Darvas

programme.title: The Little cunning vixen by Leo≈° Jan√°ƒçek at the Opera national de Paris
programme.desc: The Little Cunning Vixen, by Leos Janacek Orchestra, Chorus and Atelier Lyrique of Opera National de Paris, Dennis Russell Davies (direction) Andre Engel (stage director) Elena Tsallagova (the vixen), Jukka Rasilainen (Gamekeeper), Mich√®le Lagrange (Gamekeepers wife / Owl), Hannah Esther Minutillo (the fox), David Kuebler (Schoolmaster), Roland Bracht (Priest), Paul Gay (Harasta) Directed by Don Kent Recorded at the Opera national de Paris in 2008 The story is actually very simple: a gamekeeper falls in love with a vixen, who symbolises beauty, femininity and wit. She lives among humans and understands that animals are free, rather than slaves to the human race. A fantastic and entertaining bestiary appears on stage. The childrens performance is superb. Who else could convey such freshness, such savagery and such an imaginary world? We are offered a glimpse of an enchanted and fantastical world where love and freedom reign supreme. This light-spirited, na√Øve and melancholy fable introduces us to the great theatre of life. With ineffable poetry, Jan√°cek listens to and recreates the eternal Song of the Earth. .

programme.title: Tchaikovsky
programme.sub-title: Tchaikovsky: The Queen of Spades - Bayerische Staatsoper
programme.desc: The Queen of Spades Opera in three acts, op. 68, by Piotr Ilych Tchaikovsky (1840 - 1893) Libretto by Modest Ilych Tchaikovsky after Alexander Pushkins novella First performance in Saint-Petersburg, Mariinsky Theatre, 19 December 1890 Bayerisches Staatsorchester, Bayerischer Staatsopernchor, Kinderchor des Bayerischen Staatsoper, Aziz Shokhakimov (Conductor) Benedict Andrews (Stage direction) Rufus Didwiszus (sets), Victoria Behr (costumes), Jon Clark (lighting) Asmik Grigorian (Liza) Brandon Jovanovich (Herman) Roman Burdenko (Count Tomsky) Boris Pinkhasovich (Yeletsky) Kevin Conners (Chekalinsky) B√°lint Szabo (Surin) Tansel Akzeybek (Chaplitsky) Nikita Volkov (Narumov) Violeta Urmana (Countess) Munich, Staatsoper, 10 February 2024

programme.title: Richter, the Enigma
programme.desc: Richter, the Enigma Prokofievs 9th Sonata was dedicated to him, he played at Stalins funeral with Oistrakh and Rostropovitch and accompanied Schwarzkopf and Fischer-Dieskau: Sviatoslav Richter was THE Soviet pianist par excellence. This portrait, illustrated with rare and unpublished archival documents from the 1950s to the artists death, gives a view of life in Soviet Russia from the perspective of one of the greatest and yet most enigmatic world pianists. Directed by Bruno Monsaingeon 1997

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore OGs return for a spin off series that sees them get up to their old antics on holiday. Heading of on vacation together for the month, see if the cast are still up for a Blast in a Glass or if theyve mellowed out now theyre supposed to be real adults. With a wedding on the cards and an ongoing court case, will they even have time to Jersey Turnpike? Reunite with the OGs again and get an update on how life after the Shore is treating them, over ten years since they first burst onto our screens.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Ink Master
programme.desc: Reality competition series. Some of Americas most ambitious tattoo artists compete in a series of challenges showcasing their remarkable skills and artistic styles. The artists will have to "ink on their feet" if they are to prevail, as in each episode a contestant is eliminated from the show, with the last artist standing taking home the whopping $100,000 prize and, of course, the heralded title of Ink Master. The contestants works are judged by both experts in the industry and tattoo enthusiasts. Presented by Dave Navarro, guitarist of rock band Janes Addiction and former guitarist of the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jade, Kailyn, Leah, Briana and Chelsea navigate parenting, family dynamics, careers and love lives. Through their highs and lows theyve learned that motherhood is doing whats best for their kids, which comes at no easy cost. Over the last few seasons, the Teen Moms have been tested over and over again, by baby daddy drama and struggles with family members. But, theyve put on brave faces and absorbed the pressure, trying to be strong and set the best examples for their kids. This cycle, the pent-up stress from years of dealing with deadbeat dads, unstable parents, and lying exes has reached its max and needs release. This burst of energy (and emotions) - now in the form of tense confrontations, public arguments and anxiety attacks - threatens the progress the women have made in recent years. On top of it all, the moms must face difficult decisions when the spread of COVID- 19 threatens the health and safety of their families. Will the explosive drama leave permanent relationship scars, or will the Moms avoid burns and push forward to their next chapters free and clear?

programme.title: Valede v√µrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Bryan felt like he hit the jackpot when he came across Elene on a dating app about a year ago but now that the newness is wearing off, hes realizing its not as perfect as he thought. He needs answers before he can take the relationship further.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Ink Master
programme.desc: Reality competition series. Some of Americas most ambitious tattoo artists compete in a series of challenges showcasing their remarkable skills and artistic styles. The artists will have to "ink on their feet" if they are to prevail, as in each episode a contestant is eliminated from the show, with the last artist standing taking home the whopping $100,000 prize and, of course, the heralded title of Ink Master. The contestants works are judged by both experts in the industry and tattoo enthusiasts. Presented by Dave Navarro, guitarist of rock band Janes Addiction and former guitarist of the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jade, Kailyn, Leah, Briana and Chelsea navigate parenting, family dynamics, careers and love lives. Through their highs and lows theyve learned that motherhood is doing whats best for their kids, which comes at no easy cost. Over the last few seasons, the Teen Moms have been tested over and over again, by baby daddy drama and struggles with family members. But, theyve put on brave faces and absorbed the pressure, trying to be strong and set the best examples for their kids. This cycle, the pent-up stress from years of dealing with deadbeat dads, unstable parents, and lying exes has reached its max and needs release. This burst of energy (and emotions) - now in the form of tense confrontations, public arguments and anxiety attacks - threatens the progress the women have made in recent years. On top of it all, the moms must face difficult decisions when the spread of COVID- 19 threatens the health and safety of their families. Will the explosive drama leave permanent relationship scars, or will the Moms avoid burns and push forward to their next chapters free and clear?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: The Geordies are back but theres trouble in the Toon. Chloe and Sam have broken up but they still live together and to make things super awkward, theyre coming back into the house together...#Complicated! Annas kept the Newbies on! Nats coming back wanting to make stronger friendships with the other girls, Bethan and Beau are still seeing each other and Tahlias looking forward to chasing boys and, who knows, maybe even girls?! But to spice things up, the Boss is also bringing back Original Geordie James and Party Animal Abbie. James is single and ready to mingle and Abbies got a boyfriend but is ready to fight for her place in the house, which doesnt go down well with Beau and Bethan. Chloe and Sams relationship status changes like the wind but things come to a head when a secret about Chloe in Ibiza is revealed! Nay fear though, Nathan makes sure the family doesnt fall apart and the Squad are as Radge as ever, they party hard in Portugal and even give camping a go - its a pure frisk!

But to spice things up, the Boss is also bringing back Original Geordie James and Party Animal Abbie. James is single and ready to mingle and Abbies got a boyfriend but is ready to fight for her place in the house, which doesnt go down well with Beau and Bethan. Chloe and Sams relationship status changes like the wind but things come to a head when a secret about Chloe in Ibiza is revealed! Nay fear though, Nathan makes sure the family doesnt fall apart and the Squad are as Radge as ever, they party hard in Portugal and even give camping a go - its a pure frisk!

programme.title: Ink Master
programme.desc: Reality competition series. Some of Americas most ambitious tattoo artists compete in a series of challenges showcasing their remarkable skills and artistic styles. The artists will have to "ink on their feet" if they are to prevail, as in each episode a contestant is eliminated from the show, with the last artist standing taking home the whopping $100,000 prize and, of course, the heralded title of Ink Master. The contestants works are judged by both experts in the industry and tattoo enthusiasts. Presented by Dave Navarro, guitarist of rock band Janes Addiction and former guitarist of the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The African Savanna is home to the ultimate animal sisterhood; a family of elephants. A new baby will need the familys support to make it through her early vulnerable months. While mom learns how to care for her, it is the babys grandmother, the matriarch, that must protect her. Facing predators, drought and a rapidly changing world can this new baby and her family of iconic females survive?

programme.title: Cecil
programme.sub-title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwanges lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africas most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecils story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. Propelled by Jeremy Irons gripping narration, Eternal Enemies reveals the story of conflict between lions and hyenas, relatively unknown or even suspected in the scientific world before this. The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The Congo Forest in Central Africa is home to a secretive animal we still know very little about. Bonobos are one of our closest relatives, but in their society its females who rule. A young bonobo must leave behind her family, to find her place in the world. Here, friendship is the key to survival. She must make new friends and impress the alpha female before she can truly fit in.

programme.title: Cecil
programme.sub-title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwanges lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africas most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecils story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. Propelled by Jeremy Irons gripping narration, Eternal Enemies reveals the story of conflict between lions and hyenas, relatively unknown or even suspected in the scientific world before this. The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in New Mexico
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and The Snuggly
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols rush to prepare for their farms first Michigan winter. The family goes into hyperdrive to fix the pasture fence and finish building the garden hardscape before the first snow falls. Beth is worried about the bees, so she brings in some expert help to hopefully ensure their survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its winter on the farm, and the Pols are adding to their flock! The family is bringing in four merino ewes that were recently bred, which means with any luck the farm could be expecting its first lambs come springtime. And as winter fades into spring, the Pols prepare for the new arrivals by building a lambing pen. Meanwhile, Beth checks if her bees survived the winter.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Kiskjate saladused
programme.desc: Secret Life of Predators is a National Geography documentary series narrated by Boone Smith, exploring animals that are on the top of the food chains in the environments they inhabit, such as eagles, tigers and bears. Meet some of the deadliest creatures, from rainforests and African savannas to the depths of the ocean. Find out the strategies these animals use to fight for their survival, and why are these hunter species the most successful when it comes to it.

programme.title: Kiskjate saladused
programme.desc: If youre a forest predator, success requires using trees to bridge the gap between life and death. In this realm, danger - or your next meal - could be behind you, below, or above you. Whether youre a Harpy eagle, zeroing in on prey from high in the rainforest canopy, a cunning weasel, scouring for a meal in and out of mossy logs, or a Bengal tiger, trying to stalk in a bare, dry forest, catching prey among the trees is a challenge.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols are preparing for sheep to give birth, which means figuring out how to catch and shear their four Merino ewes - no small task as this is new territory for everyone except Dr. Pol. Then, while helping his dad on a farm call, Charles has a terrifying accident. The whole family rallies together to care for Charles and take care of the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its been a year of farming for the Pol family. Even with Charles recovering from his injury, the farms showing no signs of slowing down! Beth takes the next step with her bees to grow the colony and harvest honey. Charles and Ben come up with a final fix for the sheep huts drainage problem. The whole family comes together to plant the garden and celebrate a successful year on the farm.

programme.title: Ultimate Rivals
programme.desc: Canines and felines have been living side by side in Africa for hundreds of thousands of years, and theyve never really gotten along-not even amongst themselves. Throw the hyena into the mix and theyre all nightmare neighbors? Stealing from each other; harassing each other; eating each others young. Avoidance might be the only way to stay alive. Cats, dogs and the wild-card hyena, all jousting in a free for all for survival.

programme.title: Wild Mediterranean
programme.desc: A wealth of wildlife make their homes in the Mediterraneans serene waters, along its vast coastlines and on its remote islands.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Death Knocks. Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Eyes on the Pride. Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett, the story of Malika is one of hardship, loneliness, and determination. She must battle her uncles to establish a territory of her own where she can start a family.

programme.title: Soul of the Cat
programme.desc: This film will look at the behaviors between domestic cats and their wild cousins and ancestors, specifically to draw those parallels and to explain to "owners" what they are seeing when they watch their cat.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: From tree-climbing leopards to skull-crushing Jaguars, from fast-swimming fishing cats to quick-digging sand cats - watch the killer strategies that make wild cats possibly the deadliest family on the planet.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Katastroofi Lahkamine
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. Why did the oil rig Piper Alpha explode; the most lethal offshore accident in history?

Will the evil squirrels precisely planned plot pay or get him played? The Terror of Madagascar: A special delivery has come from Madagascar. What is it? A baby Fossa! Everyone is enchanted by the little tyke except King Julien, who sees him as a lemur-devouring predator, and he has the toothmarks on his butt to prove it! Julien formulates a plan to get rid of the adorable little carnivore, but his slithery solution becomes much worse than the problem!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Feline Fervor: King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. A kindly old lady thinks hes a cat and swoops him up. Hes encroaching on anothers turf, though - the apartments already home to a feline-impersonator, a female ferret named Zoe. Julien is taken with Zoe, and puts on his best seduction moves. Will the street-smart ferret succumb to his kingly charms? Smart money says‚Ä¶ you never know! Action Reaction: Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon. Guess what this means‚Ä¶ no more going on missions! Sitting behind a desk doing paperwork instead! Hans takes advantage of the situation and targets a massive weapons lab, and without Skipper the penguins are easily captured. How can Skipper combat the evil puffin if hes in a puffy state?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Mental Hen: Kowalski has a rival, if you even can call it a rivalry. A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future! Kowalski doesnt buy the psychic chicken hype and sets out to discredit her. The truth turns out to be far more sinister than a simple sports-pickin chicken, and Kowalski will have to use all his best moves to wiggle out of this mess. Thumb Drive: The penguins need a thumb, and Maurices fits the bill nicely. Using the opposable digit thumbprint to break into a secret weapons lab gets the penguins all atwitter. King Julien is unhappy that his right hand man is running around on missions with the birds so he sets out to sabotage the mission. As with most of King Juliens plans, this scheme turns out to be "thumbs down"!

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Analysten befurchten, dass ein riesiges Bullseye uber einer Atlantikinsel auf eine Katastrophe hindeutet, die Millionen von Menschenleben bedroht. Ein verfallenes Bauwerk im Wald erinnert an eine der unglaublichsten technischen Leistungen in der Geschichte der USA. Eine Insel mit seltsam geformten Strukturen ist das Erbe einiger der schrecklichsten Ereignisse des 20. Jahrhunderts. Eine Drohne entdeckt eine Storung in den Gewassern vor Schottland.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Als ein Historiker die √úberreste eines seltsam geformten Gebaudes in den Sumpfen Floridas untersucht, entdeckt er Beweise fur eine ungewohnliche Gemeinschaft mit einer tragischen Vergangenheit. Satelliten uber China zeigen eine Reihe seltsam geformter Kammern, die die √úberreste Tausender von Leichen enthalten, die getotet wurden, um die Konige ins Jenseits zu begleiten. Archaologen entdecken vor der spanischen Kuste die √úberreste eines Bauwerks.

programme.title: Wild assassins
programme.desc: In der Welt der wilden Killer gibt es Konige und Koniginnen der Heimlichkeit. Leoparden und Geparden sind Meister des Versteckspiels und jagen ihre Beute mit unvergleichlicher Gerissenheit. Die Gottesanbeterin ist der gefraSSigste und heimlichste Rauber der Insektenwelt. Wenn man ihnen begegnet, ist Vorsicht geboten, denn sie konnen lautlos und heimlich angreifen.

programme.title: Wild assassins
programme.desc: In dieser Folge geht es um die machtigen Tiere der Wildnis wie Elefanten, Kapbuffel, Bisons, Walrosse und Gnus, die ihre evolutionaren Waffen wie StoSSzahne und Horner einsetzen, um sich zu verteidigen und zu uberleben. Diese Tiere sind nicht nur beeindruckend groSS und stark, sondern auch gefahrlich fur Menschen und Raubtiere, die ihnen zu nahe kommen.

programme.title: Die Ostseetaucher - Einsatz unter Wasser
programme.desc: Die Crew der BT2, dem Schiff der Ostseetaucher, muss die Stabilitat der Forschungsstation FINO 2 zwischen Rugen und Danemark prufen. In 18 Meter Tiefe soll die Dicke der 15 Jahre alten, rostenden Stahlkonstruktion gemessen werden. Gleichzeitig ist ein Bergetrupp kurz vor Usedom damit beschaftigt, Schrott und Munition aus einem ehemals militarisch genutzten Hafenbecken zu holen. Bei null Sicht muss sich Taucher Jan Meter fur Meter vorwarts tasten.

programme.title: Die Ostseetaucher - Einsatz unter Wasser
programme.desc: Im Stadthafen von Wismar inspiziert Tauchazubi Justus einen in die Jahre gekommenen Bootssteg. Ausgerechnet bei diesem vermeintlich einfachen Job verliert er unter Wasser die Orientierung. Parallel dazu sondiert Tobi an der Marina von Kroslin das Hafenbecken. Hier sollen schwimmende Hauser entstehen und der Bauherr braucht grunes Licht, dass keine Weltkriegsmunition mehr im Wasser liegt. Dabei gerat der Taucher in eine brenzlige Situation.

programme.title: Josef Mengele - The Essence of Evil
programme.desc: Wie kann ein angehender Zahnarzt zum Engel des Todes in Auschwitz werden? Eine eingehende Untersuchung von Mengeles Jugend deckt die Verbindung auf zwischen medizinischer Wissenschaft, akademischen Kreisen und den Grundlagen des Nazismus, insbesondere der Eugenik, einer rassistischen Wissenschaft aus den angelsachsischen Landern. Mengele ist das grausame Produkt dieser Ideologien, die er in Auschwitz skrupellos umsetzt.

programme.title: Josef Mengele - The Essence of Evil
programme.desc: Josef Mengele, der Todesengel von Auschwitz, fuhrte schreckliche Experimente durch. Durch historische Forschung und √úberlebendenberichte werden seine taglichen Aufgaben und die Verbindungen zwischen dem deutschen akademischen System und den Graueltaten der Nazi-√Ñrzte aufgedeckt. Was sind historische Wahrheit und urbane Legenden?

programme.title: Nachrichten

programme.title: Josef Mengele - The Essence of Evil
programme.desc: Am Ende des Krieges wird Josef Mengele von den Alliierten gefangen genommen, aber aus unbekannten Grunden freigelassen. Sein Leben als Fluchtling beginnt in Bayern und endet 1979 an der brasilianischen Kuste. Trotz seines komfortablen Lebens in Sudamerika bleibt er nach der Verhaftung Eichmanns durch den Mossad auf der Flucht und wird zum meistgesuchten Nazi-Verbrecher. Dennoch gelingt es niemandem, ihn zu fassen. Wie war das moglich?.

programme.title: Auslandsreport
programme.desc: Aktuell, authentisch und nah dran an den Menschen und ihren Schicksalen: Der n-tv Auslandsreport mit Nadja Kriewald beleuchtet Themen aus aller Welt und zeigt die Menschen und Geschichten hinter den Schlagzeilen aus der Ferne. Ob Opfer der Atomversuche in der kasachischen Wuste oder syrische Fluchtlinge in der Turkei - der Auslandsreport berichtet seit 1997 uber Ereignisse und ihre Auswirkungen rund um den Globus.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Von Wracks von Hochgeschwindigkeitszugen, die durch die Gleise rasen, uber Kollisionen von Passagierflugzeugen in der Luft bis hin zu ausufernden Massenkarambolagen auf uberfullten Autobahnen. Wenn Zuge und Flugzeuge kollidieren, sei es am Boden oder in der Luft, konnen die Folgen katastrophal sein, unzahlige Menschenleben gefahrden und Zerstorungen hinterlassen.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Die Doku zeigt schief gelaufenen Expeditionen, zum Beispiel die Umrundung der Erde von Amelia Earhart, der Everest-Katastrophe von 1996 und der verlorenen Stadt Z, dem Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race, der Cecilio Lopez Sanchez Rescue Mission und der Picards Air Balloon Tour - fesselnde Geschichten mit bemerkenswerten Charakteren und Hollywoodwurdigen Geschichten.

programme.title: Das Pantheon - Roms antiker Superbau
programme.desc: Das Pantheon in Rom ist ein symboltrachtiges Bauwerk, aber auch ein wahres architektonisches Wunder! Seine AusmaSSe sind auSSergewohnlich und viele Geheimnisse ranken sich um seinen Bau. Wie sieht das Fundament aus, das ein solches Monument tragen kann? Wie halt die Kuppel ohne sichtbare Pfeiler? Nachdem es zwei Brande uberstanden hat, geplundert und teilweise zerstort wurde, thront das Pantheon immer noch im Zentrum Roms.

programme.title: Mees minu peas
programme.desc: Filmi tegevus toimub aastavahetuse-eelses Moskvas. Naine kukub liuvaljal, kaotab teadvuse ning arkab haiglas. Teadveele tulles tajub ta, et tema pahe on asunud tundmatu mees.

programme.title: Schiller, –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ—Ä—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞
programme.desc: Schiller ‚Äî –º—É–∑—ã–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –Ω–µ–º–µ—Ü–∫–æ–≥–æ –º—É–∑—ã–∫–∞–Ω—Ç–∞ –ö—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ñ–µ—Ä–∞ —Ñ–æ–Ω –î–∞–π–ª–µ–Ω–∞.

programme.title: Tantsija
programme.desc: Andeka tantsija Sergei Polunini dokumentaalportree. Polunin oli Londoni Kuningliku Balleti noorim esitantsija, kes ootamatult lavalt lahkus. See tekitas ≈°oki tema austajates ja ka nendes, kes olid nimetanud teda skandaalitsejaks ning klassikalise balleti pahaks poisiks. Polulin siirdus Venemaale. Filmi tegevustik toimub mitmes linnas, kuid tahtsaimad paigad, mille Sergei Polunin vallutas, on Kiievi, Londoni ja Moskva balletilavad.
